wikitext.*:
'''''crist''''' means "cleaver, sword" in [[Noldorin]].<ref name=LR>{{LR|Etymologies}}, p. 365</ref>

[[Didier Willis]] has suggested that ''crist'' (retaining the same meaning) could be valid [[Neo-Elvish|Neo-Sindarin]].<ref name=DW>{{webcite|author=[[Didier Willis]]|articleurl=http://www.jrrvf.com/hisweloke/sindar/online/english.html|articlename=Hiswelókë's Sindarin Dictionary|dated=|website=[http://www.jrrvf.com/haut.shtml Jrrvf.com]|accessed=15 September 2012}}</ref>

==Etymology==
*[[Sundocarme|Root]]: KIRÍS ("cut")<ref name=LR/><ref>{{VT|45a}}, p. 23</ref>
